T02D2951:29b-0: @29b * // dpal rdo rje rnam par 'joms pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2951:29b-1: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor du dbang bskur
T02D2951:29b-2: bar 'dod pa'i sgrub pa po dam tshig dang ldan
T02D2951:29b-3: pas / gnas khang yid dang mthun par sa'i cho ga rnams rdzogs par byas la /
T02D2951:29b-4: rgyal po chen po bzhi'i dkyil 'khor bzhengs la /
T02D2951:29b-5: sa stegs gru gsum mnyam zhing chags kyis 'thas par bya zhing /
T02D2951:29b-6: de nas thig le'u tse dgur btab la le'u tse lnga pa gru bzhi sgo bzhi pa /
T02D2951:29b-7: dbus kyi le'u tse dkar po shar ljang lho nag po /
T02D2951:29b-8: nub dmar po byang ser po de'i bar gyi rtsig
T02D2951:29b-9: pa sngon po la gser gyi dong rtse brtsegs pa
T02D2951:29b-10: / grva rnams su bum pa dmar po dpag bsam gyi shing dang /
T02D2951:29b-11: nor bu'i nang na chu 'bab pa bri /
T02D2951:29b-12: gru'i dum bu ljang gur bya /
T02D2951:29b-13: sgo rim dang 'dra ba bris la bum pa lnga
T02D2951:29b-14: la sogs pa sku mdog mthun pa'i tshon gyis bsgyur
T02D2951:30a-1: so so'i phyag mtshan btab la so so'i gnas su bzhag la skud pa sngon dmar gyis sprel la /
T02D2951:30a-2: phyogs mtshams su me long gi phreng ba dang /
T02D2951:30a-4: dril bu g-yer kha'i dra bas bres so //
T02D2951:30a-5: steng nas ras dkar po'i gdugs kyis bkab la /
T02D2951:30a-6: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan par bya'o //
T02D2951:30a-7: shog bu la rgyal po chen po bzhi'i gzugs bris la mda' la btags la gnas su gzugs so //
T02D2951:30a-8: de nas bgegs bskrad pa la sogs pa byas la
T02D2951:30a-9: dbus kyi bum pa la dpal rdo rje rnam 'joms
T02D2951:30a-10: sku mdog dkar por gyur te bum pa'i phyag rgyas
T02D2951:30a-11: spyan drangs te sngags brgya rtsa brgyad brjod la p'u
T02D2951:30a-12: dza la sogs rdzogs par dbul /
T02D2951:30a-13: de nas shar phyogs kyi bum par r'a dza yul 'khor srung spyan drangs te /
T02D2951:30a-14: lag pa g-yon pa pi wang len pa ltar byas
T02D2951:30a-15: la aom dhri sv'a h'a zhes pa brgya brjod pas
T02D2951:30a-16: bum pa'i nang du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng
T02D2951:30a-17: du seng ge'i gdan gyi steng du /
T02D2951:30a-18: yul 'khor srung ljang gu rin po che'i rgyan rnams kyis brgyan pa /
T02D2951:30a-19: dar gyi lhab lhub pa dang bse'i rmog zhu gsol ba /
T02D2951:30a-20: phyag g-yas pas pi wang 'dzin pa g-yon gyis len pa bskyed do //
T02D2951:30a-21: lho'i bum par 'phags skyes po spyan drangs te /
T02D2951:30a-22: bskyed pa ni lag pa g-yas pa'i mdzub mo dang gung mo sbyar te bsgrengs la ;
T02D2951:30a-23: aom b'i sv'a h'a zhes brgya brjod pas /
T02D2951:30a-24: 'phags skyes po sku mdog nag po dar gyi lhab
T02D2951:30a-25: lhub dang rin po che dang bse'i rmog zhu gsol
T02D2951:30a-26: ba / phyag na ral gri bsnams pa snga ma bzhin du bskyed do //
T02D2951:30a-27: nub kyi bum par spyan mi bzang spyan drangs te
T02D2951:30a-28: bskyed pa ni g-yon pa'i mdzub mo zhags pa ltar
T02D2951:30a-29: bya ste ; aom ksha sv'a h'a zhes pa brgya
T02D2951:30a-30: brjod pas spyan mi bzang sku mdog dmar po dar
T02D2951:30a-32: sprul mgo bdung yis bskor ba spyan dmar la 'bur ba /
T02D2951:30a-33: phyag na chu srin dang zhags pa bsnams pa bskyed do //
T02D2951:30a-34: byang gi bum pa la rnam thos msras spyan drangs te bskyed pa ni /
T02D2951:30a-35: lag pa gnyis kyis mthe bong gze mo'i rna ba ltar byas la /
T02D2951:30a-36: aom bee sv'a h'a zhes brjod pas rnam sras mdog
T02D2951:30a-37: ser po gser btsom 'dra ba dar la sogs pas
T02D2951:30a-38: brgyan pa phyag na ne'u le'i rkyal pa gser gyi
T02D2951:30a-39: dong rtses bkang ba bskyed do //
T02D2951:30a-40: de nas sgrub pa po bdag nyid kyis khrus byas la /
T02D2951:30b-1: bzlas pa bya ba ni lha de dag gi snying
T02D2951:30b-2: ga'i dkyil 'khor gyi sngags kyi rang skra la sogs
T02D2951:30b-3: pa dmigs te / aom tsa ra ni tsa ra /
T02D2951:30b-5: aom sa ra sa ra sv'a h'a /
T02D2951:30b-6: aom m'a ra ya sv'a h'a /
T02D2951:30b-7: aom bi d'a ra ya sv'a h'a zhes bum pa
T02D2951:30b-8: ral gri phrag re so so'i las kyi sngags bzlas
T02D2951:30b-9: shing de nyid mchod pa la sogs pa bya ste
T02D2951:30b-10: / dbang bskur ba ltar dbang bskur ro //
T02D2951:30b-11: gtor ma gtong ba la sogs pa spyir 'dra'o //
